summary: Diff appears to implement per-link image/color fields in the backend with a migration, introduces a stable (explicit) link id model exposed as LinkResponse, updates Add/Edit link UIs to handle optional image upload + color selection, and replaces the library view with an app-like tile grid including hover/focus interactions and per-tile color styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Client-side validation enforcing a max image size (2MB) and image MIME-type checks for uploads.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14/REQ-15 require optional image upload with preview and clear/replace, but do not request specific file size limits or MIME-type validation rules.
